评论概述: Okay, for using once or twice
评论详情: The polka dot "headband" is not a headband at all, it's one long strip of thin wire with fabric around it. You can bend it around your head, like a headband, but it was slipping all day, even with bobby pins. The scarf is a decent size, but it was fraying and losing strings by the end of the day. I wore the red earrings and they were nice. Overall I wouldn't wear the headband again, and the scarf has maybe one more day in it. Got the job done for the price, but pretty disappointed that I won't be able to use the biggest elements of the look again.
The earrings  was miss out my package  📦
